title: jnAapponE annaiyE
sahitya:
jnAnaponnE annaiyE unnaiyE jnAnamAgap-pADa aruL sheidAyE


anupallavi

  jnAna vaDivE abirahAm ponnE gAnam sheidE kAna sheidAyE


caraNam    annapUraNiyE saundara tangamE sundara jyOtiyE Ananda guNamE
dhanamE tavam sheidunai amarakalavalli kanaka vEdap-paN shUDa bhAggiyam tA vA
